tpeg_message.summary: M2 Kent - M2 exit slip road closed London-bound at J5, A249 (Sittingbourne), because of major roadworks.
M2 Kent - Speed restriction of 50 mph and one lane closed on M2 in both directions between J6, A251 (Faversham) and J5, A249 (Sittingbourne), because of roadworks.
M20 Kent - One lane closed and it's slow on M20 London-bound from J11a, Channel Tunnel to J11, A20 (Hythe), because of an overturned vehicle.

A249 Kent - A249 in Stockbury Valley closed southbound from Sittingbourne to Hucking Turn Off, because of major roadworks. Diversion in operation - turn around at J4 to exit coastbound for Sittingbourne, or the A229 Blue Bell Hill from J3 Chatham, to go south to the M20.

A226 Kent - A226 Galley Hill Road in Swanscombe closed in both directions between the High Street junction and the Snowden Hill junction, because of a landslip and long-term roadworks. Diversion in operation - via the A2 between Greenhithe and Ebbsfleet.
A26 Kent - A26 Tonbridge Road in Maidstone closed in both directions from the Westree Road junction to the Bower Street junction, because of gas main work.

A249 Kent - The exit and entry slip roads are closed on A249 northbound in Kemsley at Iwade, because of junction improvements. Diversion in operation - via the Kingsferry Roundabout and back, or via Sittingbourne.
